summary: In a not too distant future, a young man's outlook on his home android begins to change after tracking the android's behavioral log to a mysterious cafe.
cast: Jun Fukuyama|Kenji Nojima|Rie Tanaka|Rina Satô|Yukana Nogami|Michio Nakao|Miki Itô|Motomu Kiyokawa|Miyuki Sawashiro|Tomokazu Sugita|Yûko Mizutani|Yuriko Yamaguchi|Unshô Ishizuka|Yûko Sanpei|Mitsuki Saiga|Akio Nojima|Carrie Keranen|Yuri Lowenthal|Casey Mongillo|Cassandra Lee Morris|Lisa Ortiz|Derek Stephen Prince|Cindy Robinson|Tara Sands|Sean Schemmel|Patrick Seitz|Stephanie Sheh|Michael Sinterniklaas|Paul St. Peter|Joe Thomas|JB Blanc
title: Eve no jikan
